name: MailBlocks
description: Build responsive email templates with MODX and ContentBlocks. This extra uses the MJML templating system (https://mjml.io) and requires NodeJS to be installed on your server.
author: Hugo Peek

chunks.name: mbSectionSingleColumn
chunks.description: A layout segment for your email template, 100% wide.

chunks.name: mbSectionContentSidebar
chunks.description: A content area, followed by an adjustable width sidebar.

chunks.name: mbSectionSidebarContent
chunks.description: A sidebar that is adjustable in width, plus a content area.

chunks.name: mbContentText
chunks.description: Regular content copy, coming from a rich text field.

chunks.name: mbContentButton
chunks.description: Links to places outside of the email. Can optionally contain a tracking URL.

chunks.name: mbContentImage
chunks.description: An fixed width image, with a full URI to its source.

chunks.name: mbContentSocial
chunks.description: A row of social media icons. You can choose which channels to display (or hide).

chunks.name: mbContentDivider
chunks.description: A horizontal line for dividing content inside a section.

plugins.name: mjmlToHTML
plugins.description: Execute a shell command to transform the MJML syntax into HTML. Requires NodeJS and MJML to be installed, and the PHP exec() function to be available on the server.
